Noone should be bashing anyone, we should all just
accept everyone else even if there style is stupid
unless they break the rules in which case we should
respectfully correct them (think this nice peacemaker
bit will help when and if the next election ever
comes?).

--- Hollywood Narrator Countdown <thecode@...>
wrote:
> OOC: No, that is hypocritical. I can bash any guy I
> want to. Apparently he had the right to bash me, now
> he gets his return...
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: Kyle Stewart
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Tuesday, August 06, 2002 7:14 AM
>   Subject: Re: Flicker/Phoenix/Preds (rAuq where the
> Pit are you)
> 
> 
>   Just leave the guy alone, real people talk about
>   trivial facts and so fantasy characters should
> talk
>   about trivial facts to seem realistic, just leave
> him
>   alone.
> 
>   --- Hollywood Narrator Countdown
> <thecode@...>
>   wrote:
>   > OOC: Stupid, boring, useless, what was the point
> of
>   > this post? Get serious about your posts or get
>   > out...
>   > 
>   >   ----- Original Message -----
>   >   From: cardhead649
>   >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>   >   Sent: Sunday, August 04, 2002 9:06 PM
>   >   Subject: Re: Flicker/Phoenix/Preds (rAuq where
> the
>   > Pit are you)
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   "Well, I've heard the Rogues talk about
> Megatron,"
>   > she admits.  "From 
>   >   what they said, he's not exactly the nicest
> bot
>   > around."
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
>   > <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
>   >   > Flicker:  Why wouldn't it be?
>   >   > 
>   >   > --- cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
>   >   > > "Are you sure it'll be all right?" Phoenix
>   > asks,
>   >   > > worried.  The 
>   >   > > communication with Megatron has reminded
> her
>   > of all
>   >   > > the things the 
>   >   > > Rogues have said in her hearing about
>   > Megatron. 
>   >   > > They didn't paint a 
>   >   > > very pretty picture.
>   >   > > 
>   >   > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
>   > <dewboy30816@y...>
>   >   > > wrote:
>   >   > > > They approach the Pred base and Flicker
>   > opens a
>   >   > > comm
>   >   > > > link.
>   >   > > > 
>   >   > > > Flicker:  Greetings mighty Megatron
> great
>   > leader
>   >   > > of
>   >   > > > the Predicons.  I am Flicker, myself and
> my
>   >   > > companion
>   >   > > > request an audience with your person.
>   >   > > > 
>   >   > > > He hoped that the slag he had just spit
> out
>   > gave
>   >   > > him a
>   >   > > > good first impression, bacause he had no
>   > intention
>   >   > > of
>   >   > > > talking like that  whenever Megatron
> came
>   > into the

> guy.
